prop.value: SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`, MA.msgcode, MA.msg, MA.active, MA.incrementflag, MA.datetime FROM vi_xmobilealerts_mo MA,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE MA.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND MA.dist_code IN ('#$distid#','0') AND MA.salesman_code IN ('#$sid#','0') AND MA.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,'#$distid#' AS `dist_code`,RE.reasoncode,RE.applicable_transactions,RE.reason_desc,RE.datetime,RE.active,RE.incrementflag FROM vi_xreason_mo RE,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE RE.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND RE.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `potentialclassificationcount` FROM vi_xpotentialclassification_mo PC WHERE PC.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND PC.sman_code = '#$sid#' AND PC.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PC.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT SNO, customercode as CustID, customername as CustName, BeatID, BeatName, distributorcode as ForumCode, CustCtgryID, HindiScript, Phonenumber FROM sify_retailer_view where distributorcode = '#$distid#'

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,GC.dist_code,GC.general_clas_code,GC.general_clas_desc,GC.datetime,GC.incrementflag,GC.active FROM vi_xgeneralclassification_mo GC, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE GC.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND GC.sman_code = '#$sid#' AND GC.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND GC.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`, R.dist_code, R.salesman_code, R.beat_code, R.ret_code, R.ret_name, R.ret_creditdays, R.ret_creditbills, R.ret_creditamount, R.pay_mode, R.discount, R.channel_code, R.pot_code, R.general_clas_code, R.ret_state, R.value_clas_code, R.datetime, R.incrementflag, R.active, R.customer_group FROM vi_xreatailer_mo R, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE R.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND R.salesman_code = '#$sid#' AND R.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND R.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `reasoncount` FROM vi_xreason_mo RE WHERE RE.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND RE.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,PI.id, PI.invtranseres, PI.invdate, PI.invnumber, PI.totamo, PI.outstandamo, PI.dist_code, PI.ret_code, PI.datetime, PI.creatdate, PI.incrementflag, "SalesInvoice" AS `type` FROM vi_xpendinginvoice_mo PI,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE PI.dist_code = '#$distid#'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `schemecount` FROM vi_xscheme_mo SC WHERE SC.dist_code LIKE '%#$distid#%' AND SC.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND SC.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`, SC.schemecode, SC.scheme_name, SC.schemedescription, SC.schemetype, SC.scheme_level, SC.scheme_definition, SC.apply_schemes_on, SC.applicable_on, SC.combination_scheme, SC.roundoff_rule, SC.benefit_type, SC.slab_id, SC.slab_start, SC.slab_start_uom, SC.slab_min_uom, SC.slab_max_uom, SC.slab_for_every_applicable_on, SC.slab_end, SC.slab_end_uom, SC.re_apply_excess_achieved, SC.for_every, SC.free_product_name, SC.free_product_uom, SC.free_product_qty, SC.discount_amount, SC.discount_percentage, SC.point,SC.minimum, SC.maximum, SC.product_hierarchy_Path, SC.product_name, SC.categorygroup, SC.productgroup, SC.product_property, SC.uom_type, SC.minimum_qty, CASE (ISNULL(SC.retailer_channel_hierarchy) OR SC.retailer_channel_hierarchy = '') WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE SC.retailer_channel_hierarchy END AS `retailer_channel_hierarchy`, CASE (ISNULL(SC.retailer_value_classification) OR SC.retailer_value_classification = '') WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE SC.retailer_value_classification END AS `retailer_value_classification`, CASE (ISNULL(SC.retailer_customer_group) OR SC.retailer_customer_group = '') WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE SC.retailer_customer_group END AS `retailer_customer_group`, CASE (ISNULL(SC.retailer_general_classification) OR SC.retailer_general_classification = '') WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE SC.retailer_general_classification END AS `retailer_general_classification`, CASE (ISNULL(SC.retailer_potential_classification) OR SC.retailer_potential_classification = '') WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE SC.retailer_potential_classification END AS `retailer_potential_classification`, CASE (ISNULL(SC.retailer_billing_mode) OR SC.retailer_billing_mode = '') WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE SC.retailer_billing_mode END AS `retailer_billing_mode`, SC.retailer_billing_type,SC.free_criteria, SC.effective_from_date, SC.effective_to_date, '#$distid#' AS `dist_code`, SC.datetime, SC.active, SC.incrementflag FROM vi_xscheme_mo SC, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE SC.dist_code LIKE '%#$distid#%' AND SC.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND SC.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,VS.dist_code,VS.prod_code,VS.batch_code,VS.ptr,VS.mrp,VS.datetime,VS.active,VS.incrementflag FROM vi_xpricemaster_mo VS,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE VS.dist_code = '#$distid#'

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,PT.paytypecode,PT.paytype,PT.datetime,PT.active,PT.incrementflag FROM vi_xpaymenttype_mo PT, (SELECT @a:= 0) AS a WHERE PT.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PT.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `productwiselatestbatchcount` FROM vi_xpricemaster_mo VS WHERE VS.dist_code = '#$distid#'
SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,CO.keys,CO.val,CO.datetime,CO.incrementflag FROM vi_config_mo CO,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,BM.dist_code,BM.bank_code,BM.bank_name,BM.datetime,BM.active,BM.incrementflag FROM vi_xbankmaster_mo BM,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE BM.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND BM.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND BM.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,ST.salabl,ST.damag,ST.free_salabl,ST.free_damag,ST.datetime,ST.active,ST.incrementflag FROM vi_xstocktype_mo ST,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `taxcount` FROM vi_xtax_mo TX WHERE TX.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND TX.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND TX.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`, DS.dist_code, DS.prod_code, DS.salable_qty AS `salable_quantity`, DS.ptr, DS.pts,DS.mrp,DS.incrementflag,DS.datetime FROM vi_xdiststock_mo DS,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE DS.dist_code = '#$distid#'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `collectionmethodcount` FROM vi_xcollectionmethod_mo CO WHERE CO.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND CO.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `productcount` FROM vi_xproduct_mo PRO WHERE PRO.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND PRO.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PRO.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `beatcount` FROM vi_xbeat_mo B WHERE B.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND B.salesman_code = '#$sid#' AND B.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND B.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `producthierarchycount` FROM vi_xprodhier_mo PH WHERE PH.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PH.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `valueclassificationcount` FROM vi_xvalueclassification_mo VC WHERE VC.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND VC.sman_code = '#$sid#' AND VC.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND VC.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,RB.outstanding,RB.creditbill,RB.count_credit_days,RB.ret_code,RB.dist_code,RB.salesman_code,RB.datetime,RB.incrementflag,RB.creatdate FROM vi_xreatailer_track_mo RB, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE RB.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND RB.salesman_code = '#$sid#'
Select SNO, CustCtgryID, CustCtgryDesc, '#$distid#' as ForumCode from sify_supplychainhier_view where Active=1

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,VS.dist_code,VS.prod_code,VS.batch_code,VS.ptr,VS.mrp,VS.datetime,VS.active,VS.incrementflag FROM vi_xpricemaster_mo VS,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE VS.dist_code = '#$distid#'

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`, DSFF.ret_name, CASE (ISNULL(DSFF.discount) OR DSFF.discount = '') WHEN 1 THEN 0 ELSE DSFF.discount END AS `discount`, DSFF.dist_code,DSFF.datetime,DSFF.active,DSFF.incrementflag FROM vi_xdiscountsffbill_mo DSFF, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE DSFF.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND DSFF.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT SNO, SalesmanID, SalesmanName, Password, MobileNumber, Mailid, Active, distributorcode as ForumCode from sify_salesman_view where distributorcode = '#$distid#';
SELECT COUNT(*) as retailercount from vi_xreatailer_mo R WHERE R.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND R.salesman_code = '#$sid#' AND R.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND R.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `mjpcount` FROM vi_xmjp_mo MJP WHERE MJP.salesman_code = '#$sid#' AND MJP.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND MJP.mjp_date = CURDATE()

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`, TX.dist_code, TX.prod_code, TX.state_code, TX.tax_code, TX.tax_desc, TX.lst_perc, TX.cst_perc, TX.component, TX.component_parent_id, TX.component_app_on, TX.datetime, TX.active, TX.incrementflag FROM vi_xtax_mo TX, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE TX.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND TX.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND TX.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,SO.reference, SO.creatdate,SO.datetime,SO.prod_code,SO.uom,SO.qty,SO.ret_code FROM vi_xsuggestedorders_mo SO,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE SO.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND SO.salesman_code = '#$sid#'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `productgroupcount` FROM vi_xproductgroup_mo PG WHERE PG.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND PG.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PG.active NOT IN (#$act#)
Select SNO, BankCode as BranchCode,BankName,BranchName, BankCode,ForumCode from sify_bankbranch_view where ForumCode = '#$distid#'

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `pgcategorygroupmappingcount` FROM vi_xpgcategorygroupmapping_mo PCG WHERE PCG.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND PCG.salesman_code = '#$sid#' AND PCG.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PCG.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,VC.dist_code,VC.value_clas_code,VC.value_clas_desc,VC.datetime,VC.incrementflag,VC.active FROM vi_xvalueclassification_mo VC, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE VC.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND VC.sman_code = '#$sid#' AND VC.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND VC.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `alertmessagecount` FROM vi_xmobilealerts_mo MA WHERE MA.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND MA.dist_code IN ('#$distid#','0') AND MA.salesman_code IN ('#$sid#','0') AND MA.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`, V.vanname,V.vancode, V.vannumber, V.rate_per_km, V.van_load_capacity_in_tonnes, V.rate_per_tonne, V.rate_per_day, V.dist_code, V.datetime, V.active, V.incrementflag FROM vi_xvan_mo V, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE V.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND V.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND V.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,'#$distid#' AS `dist_code`,CO.collection_code,CO.collection_desc,CO.datetime,CO.active,CO.incrementflag FROM vi_xcollectionmethod_mo CO,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE CO.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND CO.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,MJP.salesman_code,MJP.beat_code,MJP.mjp_date,MJP.no_of_retailers,MJP.dist_code,MJP.datetime,MJP.active,MJP.incrementflag FROM vi_xmjp_mo MJP,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE MJP.salesman_code = '#$sid#' AND MJP.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND MJP.mjp_date = CURDATE()

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,PH.prod_hier_code,PH.prod_hier_desc,PH.category_hier,PH.category_hier_code,PH.level_number,PH.level_code,'#$distid#' AS `dist_code`,PH.datetime,PH.active,PH.creatdate,PH.incrementflag FROM vi_xprodhier_mo PH, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE PH.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PH.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,SM.sm_code,SM.sm_name,SM.dist_code,SM.active,SM.sm_category_group,SM.product_group_code,SM.datetime,SM.incrementflag FROM vi_xsalesman_mo SM, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE SM.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND SM.sm_code = '#$sid#' AND SM.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND SM.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `retailercategorycount` FROM vi_xchannelhierarchy_mo CH WHERE CH.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND CH.sman_code = '#$sid#' AND CH.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND CH.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `bankbranchcount` FROM vi_xbankmaster_mo BM WHERE BM.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND BM.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND BM.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `uomconversionfactorcount` FROM vi_xuomconvfact_mo UCF WHERE UCF.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND UCF.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND UCF.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,BM.dist_code,BM.bank_code,BM.bank_name,BM.branch_name,BM.branch_name AS `branch_code`,BM.datetime,BM.active,BM.incrementflag FROM vi_xbankmaster_mo BM,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE BM.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND BM.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND BM.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,PCG.salesmangpcode,PCG.categorygroupcode,PCG.prod_code,PCG.dist_code,PCG.datetime,PCG.incrementflag,PCG.active,PCG.creatdate FROM vi_xpgcategorygroupmapping_mo PCG, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE PCG.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND PCG.salesman_code = '#$sid#' AND PCG.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PCG.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS `generalclassificationcount` FROM vi_xgeneralclassification_mo GC WHERE GC.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND GC.sman_code = '#$sid#' AND GC.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND GC.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,CH.dist_code,CH.channel_code,CH.channel_value,CH.category_hierarchy_details,CH.datetime,CH.datetime,CH.incrementflag,CH.active FROM vi_xchannelhierarchy_mo CH, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE CH.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND CH.sman_code = '#$sid#' AND CH.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND CH.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,U.uom_code,U.uom_desc,'#$distid#' AS `dist_code`,U.datetime,U.active,U.incrementflag FROM vi_xuom_mo U,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE U.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND U.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,PG.productmappingcode,PG.productgroupcode,PG.prod_hier_code,PG.prod_code,PG.datetime,PG.incrementflag,PG.active,PG.creatdate FROM vi_xproductgroup_mo PG, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE PG.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND PG.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PG.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `discountcount` FROM vi_xdiscountsffbill_mo DSFF WHERE DSFF.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND DSFF.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,B.dist_code,B.salesman_code,B.beat_name, B.beat_code, B.no_of_retailers,B.datetime,B.active,B.creatdate,B.incrementflag FROM vi_xbeat_mo B, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE B.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND B.salesman_code = '#$sid#' AND B.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND B.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `suggestedorderscount` FROM vi_xsuggestedorders_mo SO WHERE SO.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND SO.salesman_code = '#$sid#'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `productwisestockcount` FROM vi_xproductwisestock_mo VSS WHERE VSS.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND VSS.salesmancode = '#$sid#' AND VSS.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `retailertrackcount` FROM vi_xreatailer_track_mo WHERE dist_code = '#$distid#' AND salesman_code = '#$sid#'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `uomcount` FROM vi_xuom_mo U WHERE U.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND U.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,VSS.dist_code,VSS.prod_code,VSS.batch_code,VSS.salable_quantity,VSS.free_quantity,VSS.ptr,VSS.mrp,VSS.vancode,VSS.salesmancode,VSS.active,VSS.incrementflag,VSS.datetime FROM vi_xproductwisestock_mo VSS,(SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE VSS.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND VSS.salesmancode = '#$sid#' AND VSS.active NOT IN (#$act#)

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,PRO.dist_code,PRO.prod_code,PRO.prod_name,PRO.prod_hier_code,PRO.base_uom,PRO.uom1,PRO.uom2,PRO.category_hier_dtl,PRO.active,PRO.creatdate,PRO.incrementflag,PRO.datetime FROM vi_xproduct_mo PRO, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE PRO.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND PRO.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PRO.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `pricemastercount` FROM vi_xpricemaster_mo VS WHERE VS.dist_code = '#$distid#'

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,PC.dist_code,PC.potential_clas_code,PC.potential_clas_desc,PC.datetime,PC.incrementflag,PC.active FROM vi_xpotentialclassification_mo PC, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE PC.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND PC.sman_code = '#$sid#' AND PC.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND PC.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `vancount` FROM vi_xvan_mo V WHERE V.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND V.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND V.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT SNO, BeatID, BeatName, '#$distid#' as ForumCode FROM sify_salesman_beat_view where salesmancode = '#$sid#';
SELECT SNO, CtgryCode, CtgryName, '#$distid#' as ForumCode from sify_producthier_view where Active=1

SELECT @a:=@a+1 AS `SNO`,UCF.dist_code,UCF.product_code AS `prod_code`,UCF.base_uom_code,UCF.base_uom_conv_fact,UCF.uom1_code,UCF.uom1_conv_fact,UCF.uom2_code,UCF.uom2_conv_fact,UCF.datetime,UCF.active,UCF.incrementflag FROM vi_xuomconvfact_mo UCF, (SELECT @a:= #$offset#) AS a WHERE UCF.dist_code = '#$distid#' AND UCF.creatdate BETWEEN '#$cdt#' AND NOW() AND UCF.active NOT IN (#$act#)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `pendinginvoicecount` FROM vi_xpendinginvoice_mo PI WHERE PI.dist_code = '#$distid#'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS `diststockcount` FROM vi_xdiststock_mo DS WHERE DS.dist_code = '#$distid#'
